requirements: Conducted in English; knowledge of Spanish and Portuguese helpful but not required.
description:
Introduction to Latin American cinema, with an emphasis on postâ€“World War II films produced in Cuba, Argentina, Brazil, and Mexico. Examination of each film in its historical and aesthetic aspects, and in light of questions concerning national cinema and "third cinema." Examples from both pre-1945 and contemporary films.
Conducted in English; knowledge of Spanish and Portuguese helpful but not required.
title: Radical Cinemas of Latin America
